response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors and aspirations. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this remarkable product at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount, allowing you to secure a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. I believe this is a compelling proposition that aligns well with your interests and budget. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the necessary steps for a smooth transaction. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
